game.name: Canvas Hockey
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Canvas Hockey is a top-down, arcade-style party game with local multiplayer tournaments and a single player or co-op campaign. The game uses a painted art-style with inspirations from the 90's.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Canvas Hockey is a top-down, arcade-style party game with local multiplayer tournaments and a single player or co-op campaign. The game uses a painted art-style with inspirations from the 90's.
